name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Alcohol-based fuel ; Chamber furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 醇基燃料 ; 室燃炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该蒸汽/热水/其它醇基燃料室燃炉适用于各种规模的应用。它适用于需要大量热能的过程，如金属冶炼、化学反应或废物焚烧。这包括任何工业部门，它们的过程需要持续且高温的输出。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5449页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
源文件中描述为为醇基燃料，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasisWith terminal treatment technology，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是有末端治理，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the coefficient of production of pollutants for 0.02 S. According to the notes of their own accounting to modify the corresponding emissions. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 0.02S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
